Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: Hey Tom, nice to see you at the beach!

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: Decent pile of luggage over there. Looks like someone has a little bit of lifting to do.

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: That's interesting... I don't see anyone else around. You wouldn't be going somewhere, would you?

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: But, who will oversee the island?

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: Me? All by myself? I'm not so sure that's the best idea...

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: Perhaps you aren't feeling well from the sun. Let's go back to Resident Services and have some afternoon tea.
